translations: n.生物块礁，[地质] 生物岩礁

phrs.translation: 生物岩礁, 生物岩丘, 生物丘, 生物块礁
叠层石礁, 叠层石生物礁

sentences.sentence: Bioherm type comprises tower reef, patch reef, massive reef, platform-edge reef and atolls etc.
sentences.translation: 生物礁类型有塔礁、补丁礁、块礁、台地边缘礁、环礁。

sentences.sentence: All necessary conditions for the formation and growth of bioherm existed in the northern part of the South China Sea.
sentences.translation: 南海北部海域具备生物礁的形成和发育的一切必要条件。

sentences.sentence: On the basis of current information, the Devonian porifera bioherm is the first discovery, it not only richens the type of bioherm in Guangxi, but also …
sentences.translation: 据目前资料，泥盆纪海绵生物礁属首次发现，它不仅丰富了广西生物礁类型，而且对研究泥盆纪沉积地质学具有实际意义。
